name: jmusicdb-api
description: RESTful API to provide Japanese music/song data. Built with Express, Knex and MySQL.

scripts.build: mkdir dist && cp -R src index.js .env package.json package-lock.json dist
scripts.knex:prod: npm run prod-mode && npm run knex
scripts.rebuild: rmdir /Q /S dist && mkdir dist && cp -R src index.js .env package.json package-lock.json dist
scripts.start: npm run prod-mode && pm2 start index.js --name JMusicDB-API --watch

author: Ahmad Rivaldy S
